Containers.Description: MineOS is all about learning to be an effective game host. Even better, a system administrator. Better yet, no sacrifices are made--neither in security nor functionality--to provide users with a fun, educational, and effective server platform.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br][br] [b][u]Volume Mappings[/u][/b][br] [b]/var/games/minecraft[/b] This path is used to store the minecraft data.[br][br] [b][u]Environment Variables[/u][/b][br] [b]PASSWORD[/b] By default this is set to cr33p3r. Change this to what you wish to use.
